Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: William D. Tipton
Reviews.Content: As someone else pointed out...no speed dial...which is hideously surprising in this day and age of high tech gadgets.Other than that its a great phone. I didnt even realize for a long time that it comes with GPS, I use the free version which doesnt have all the fancy features, but lets me know where I am and how to get to where Im going along with a yellow pages function so you can find just about any business you can think of close to wherever you are currently. Its helped us keep from getting lost a few times.The phone has lost maybe 2 calls in close to a year that Ive been using this model. The only thing I'd make sure of us having a compatible charger. I ruined (my own fault for not understanding the issue) two batteries because I was using a car USB port for my cig lighter that kept right on charging even after the battery was fully charged.Bought a compatible charger instead and now it works great in the car.Battery life seems to be excellent. I can let it set for a couple days then make a few hours worth of calls before I get the low battery warning.5 Stars for what it is...just dont expect it to be a smart phone...it isnt.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone, it has 3G and GPS!
Reviews.Author: NP Dubs "Nunya Business"
Reviews.Content: Fast web browsing with 3G, if you have AT&T;, this is the phone for you, easy, lightweight, fast and loud!I love it, especially the 3MP Camera and video recording!

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Sue B
Reviews.Content: i like it for basic use... the camera is slow, other than that is perfect for AT&T.; i use it as back up.

Reviews.Title: Phone does what I need
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Having owned this model for a long time, I wanted to replace it when the battery wore out.  I can't speak to all the features of the phone, because I just need one to make calls and send a very few texts.  This phone does that for me, without having to sign on to an expensive data plan.  And the phone IS a workhorse -- no dropped calls, and I could barely tell the difference between the old phone and the new one when it arrived.  It is VERY sturdily built.  That said, the replacement phone ordered from Amazon was unlocked and worked great.  I just popped in my old SIM card, charged her up, and was up and running.  Just be sure to allow plenty of time for the initial charging of the new battery.  It took all of overnight, with the phone turned off, to get the full initial charge.  After that, long-lasting and perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: L. Rambo
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement, it works well for what we need, no bells or whistles, just a phone & pictures.

Reviews.Title: My husband likes this phone.
Reviews.Author: Grateful613
Reviews.Content: My husband likes this model and when his phone wouldn't recharge, I ordered another one. It arrived brand new, in the original box. My husband is pleased and so am I.

Reviews.Title: Review of ZTE F160 Unlocked GSM Phone
Reviews.Author: Maurice Coke
Reviews.Content: The over all features of the phone falls below the price that I paid for the phone. The phone was over priced.

Reviews.Title: Great Talkers Phone
Reviews.Author: Bebahru
Reviews.Content: This is my second ZTE F160 phone.  I purchased the first one 25 months ago from AT&T;, however they have discontinued it from their line up.  Very reliable!

Reviews.Title: RIP OFF
Reviews.Author: Jimmieka Thompson
Reviews.Content: DOn't do it !!! !! do not the phone was dirty, ringer didn't work, mp3 did not work because it was no sound the phone was coming apart horrible horrible horrible

Reviews.Title: Returned It
Reviews.Author: BarryD99
Reviews.Content: Not only does this phone not have speed dial, AT&T; reps don't know this.  Our sales person told us it had speed dial.  I called tech support and they didn't realize it didn't have speed dial.  I had a horrible time getting the local store on the phone and they told me it had speed dial and then hung up before I could test what they told me to do.  Then they didn't anser the phone.  Bad phone.  Horrible service.
